name: LifeSigns: Surgical Unit
description:
It's a matter of life and death in the unique and exciting adventure
game that allows you to become a top-notch intern at one of the best
hospitals around. Just as in real-life, you'll be continuously
confronted with medical emergencies and personnel issues that require
you immediate attention. Communicate and interact with others and
experience what it's like to examine, diagnose and operate on patients
that need your help!
